description:
Turn your TouchPad into a virtual film camera--but, MAXI-size it and digitize it! Inside My Big Cheese you will find incredible, high-resolution "skins" of two classic film cameras. Imagine the looks that you'll get holding a Polaroid 95 up to your eye and shooting an unbelievably high quality color digital pic with it. No light-sensitive film to load here. Just select a classic camera skin, hold your TouchPad up to your eye, and tap anywhere on the screen. It's that easy. Better yet, all of your photos taken with My Big Cheese are saved in a special photo album (named MyBigCheese) that is accessible with the TouchPad's Photos & Videos App. Your lens cap is always OFF with My Big Cheese.

NOTE:
You MUST have webOS 3.0.2 installed on your TouchPad.
You CANNOT operate My Big Cheese with your TouchPad tethered to your PC via USB.
Remember, point the TouchPad away from you AND don't cover the camera lens with your finger.

BONUS:
For EVERY 100 copies of My Big Cheese that are sold, ALL owners will receive a FREE OTA upgrade bonus pack of 4 additional classic camera skins.
